Text:
The Sold Out version of Tomb Raider sometimes does not contain valid audio tracks and the game loses a lot of its atmosphere as a result.
This is the full PC version with sounds attached to PSX releases!
Burn the image file.
Folder Required software by Srboljub are instructions and all necessary programs to be installed in XP/Vista/7.
Enjoy the best game of all time, with improved graphics (32 bit) and FULL sounds!
